name: Zoo Search and Rescue
description:
Zoo Search and Rescue The animals are on the loose

It's the dead of night and all the animals have broken out. It's up to you to get them all back to the zoo before the morning. Play as one of the members of the elite group of highly-trained individuals on the Zoo Search and Rescue team to collect them all before the sun rises.

Made in 14 days as a part of the B&W Jam

Controls / Gameplay
  • Control you helicopter with the mouse
  • Keep an animal in your spotlight to collect them
  • Collect all animals to win
Attribution
  • 1-bit sprites made by VECTORPIXELSTAR
  • Music "8-Bit Espionage" by Eric Matyas
  • Font "Dogica" and "Dogica Bold" by rmocci
  • The sounds "Helicopter EU"  and "Blip 5"  from Freesound.org
